My_Choices: ^Doc: Are you ready to get started or would you like me to run you through the basics?
^I can figure it out on my own.
theEnding: ^Doc: Try not to get a papercut.
TutorialBegin: ^Doc: Okay, so there are two main tasks we perform.
^Doc: To help you perform these tasks initially, you will be given two different types of animals to begin working with.
^Doc: There are many different types of BIOMES. One we had covered, the House biome.
^Doc: There are many other BIOMES which you will learn about in your time here which include Forest, Mountain, Ocean, and many more.
^Doc: The two tasks are Collecting Materials(Combat) and Researching New Creatures.
^Doc: Which task would you like to hear about first?

c-2: ^Doc: There are even rumors of mythical creatures.
^Doc: But be careful intern. Try not to take on more than you can handle. We only have so much tape and glue sticks on hand with the recent budget cuts.

research: ^Doc: First, please take a look at that pencil in the corner.
^Doc: You will be able to click that and pick between the 4 different body parts.
^Doc: You will find many different types of parts.
^Doc: Mix and match to your heart's content.
^Doc: Would you like to hear about anything else?
combat: ^Doc: So, your creatures have a certain level of strength. That strength can be augmented by using the parts of other creatures.
^Doc: This augmentation will introduce new abilities both passively and actively.
^Doc: There are two different ways you can combat creatures.
^Doc: You can go on an Adventure into the nearby wilderness.
^Doc: You can Randomly Battle creatures created by other lab assistants.
^Doc: The latter will not yield any new parts but you can see many interesting creatures like the one here.
^Doc: Would you like to hear about anything else?
